name: Woofy's Ruff Day
description:
This is a silly game made in a few days for the 5th Annual Driftwood Jam.

Woofy is a good dog.  So when his owner tells him to keep the house safe while he's out, Woofy will do everything he can to do that... Even if that means having to stop a Demon Lord from destroying the house!

Take control of Woofy and find a way to stop the Demon Lord and fix up the house, all before Woofy's owner gets home!

Features:

  • A dog who speaks only in dog-related puns
  • A small adventure game contained in one house
  • The ability to bark with the 'B' button
